Description: Beautiful home in desirable community in Riva. Large fenced-in yard with deck for entertaining. House sits back of cul-de-sac with driveway to rear large parking pad. Updated spacious open living dining and kitchen. Lower level family room has pellet stove. Upstairs 4 bedrooms and 2 full updated baths. 3 mins to local waterfront restaurants and 5-10 mins to Rt 50 and/or 97.
Large 4 Bedroom 2.5 Bath home in water privileged community of Sylvan Shores.Fishing crabbing piers dock space swim area community clubhouse available.
